content.html: The difference, in context, is that Sharia law permits abortion up to 120 days, for rape/incest, when fetus is non-viable,& to save the mother’s life—as a decision between a woman & her doctor, so there's that. Difference is, the one on the right is more extreme.
content.value: The difference, in context, is that Sharia law permits abortion up to 120 days, for rape/incest, when fetus is non-viable,& to save the mother’s life—as a decision between a woman & her doctor, so there's that. Difference is, the one on the right is more extreme.
